name: Hentai Zodiac Puzzle
description:
Hentai Zodiac Puzzle is a simple 'spot the difference' strip game. 12 pretty girls with different fetishes are waiting for you. No time limit. Enjoy the game. Choose your zodiac girl!

Middle-click to minimize the game.

Features:

  • 12 unique nude girls;
  • Each girl includes 4 stages;
  • Gallery of characters;
  • Nice original artwork;
  • Steam achievements;
  • Play with one hand ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
